channel.title: Comments on: Win32/Conficker.B also known as Downadup worm infections warning
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Internet Security
item.dc:creator: Internet Security
item.description: Norton has patch for it but then you got to get into safe mode and do some changesw manually.
item.content:encoded: Norton has patch for it but then you got to get into safe mode and do some changesw manually.

item.title: By: Charles Norrie
item.dc:creator: Charles Norrie
item.content:encoded:
Dear Mr SQLDenis,

Unfortunately Conficker seems to be able to subvert the automatic update process to its own purposes and there’s a battle royal between Redmond and US CERT about whether to switch it off or not.

It’s not for me to judge that outcome, but if it turns out it’s neceassry to turn off Autoupdate there’s going to have to be a lot of manual work.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Charles Norrie, if you had automatic updates turned on then you would also be safe on windows since this was pushed out already in October or November of last year
item.content:encoded: Charles Norrie, if you had automatic updates turned on then you would also be safe on windows since this was pushed out already in October or November of last year

item.title: By: Charles Norrie
item.dc:creator: Charles Norrie
item.content:encoded:
I appreciate any sensible person will want to patch their machine, but why not start out with one that does not need to be patched in the first place.

If you use Linux, you’ll never have to patch, because if you choose correctly, one like Ubuntu Intrepid Ibex, it’s done for you automatically, and it’s easier than Windows to install and FREE!

item.title: By: Extremesecurity
item.dc:creator: Extremesecurity
item.description:
Did Downadup/conficker attack your network? I've created a batch file for system administrators to clean/patch/cure infected systems in their networks.
check it out here:
http://extremesecurity.blogspot.com/2009/01/beat-downadupconficker-like-pro-my.html

item.title: By: Phil B
item.dc:creator: Phil B
item.description: According to http://www.downadup.com/ - a guide to removing this virus - its also important to disable AutoStart; a whole new infection vector is through USB drives.
item.content:encoded: According to http://www.downadup.com/ – a guide to removing this virus – its also important to disable AutoStart; a whole new infection vector is through USB drives.
